snippet: Matthew VanBesien, a former orchestral musician, will return from Australia, where he is director of the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra.
abstract: New York Philharmonic names Matthew VanBesien as its new executive director.
lead_paragraph: Matthew VanBesien, a former orchestral musician, will return from Australia, where he is director of the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra.

headline.seo: Matthew VanBesien Named Philharmonic’s Executive Director
headline.main: After Long Search, Philharmonic Names Top Executive
headline.print_headline: After Long Search, Philharmonic Names Top Executive
